snippet: World number two Andy Murray, four-times a losing finalist, will continue his pursuit for a first Australian Open title against Joao Sousa in the third round on Saturday....
lead_paragraph: World number two Andy Murray, four-times a losing finalist, will continue his pursuit for a first Australian Open title against Joao Sousa in the third round on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Murray Continues Pursuit of First Australian Open
headline.main: Murray Continues Pursuit of First Australian Open
